sourcesContent:
import './Navbar.css' import { Link, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { logout } from '../utils/localstorage' import { setInitialState } from '../redux/actions/userAction' import { setUserDeatils } from '../redux/actions/userAction' const Navbar = ({ click }) => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const history = useHistory() const user = useSelector(state => state.user) const dispatch = useDispatch() const { cartItems } = cart const getCartCount = () => { return cartItems.reduce((qty, item) => Number(item.qty) + qty, 0) } const _handleLogout = () => { dispatch(setInitialState()) logout() history.push('/signin') } return (

Sports Shop

  • Cart {getCartCount()}
  • Players
  • Shop
    • {!user.userInfo.isLogin ? (
  • Login
    • ) : (

  • Logout

    • )}
) } export default Navbar
